flawed_nl_solution:
The second day it rained 10*2=<<10*2=20>>20 inches
On the third day it rained 20*1.5=<<20*1.5=30>>30 inches
So in the first 3 days, it rained 10+20+30=<<10+20+30=60>>60 inches
It drained 4-1=<<4-1=7>>7 days
So it drained 7*3=<<7*3=21>>21 inches
That means on the start of the fourth day, there were 60-21=<<60-21=39>>39 inches in the pond
The area can hold 6*12=<<6*12=72>>72 inches
So it rained at least 72-39=<<72-39=33>>33 inches
#### 33

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
